Posts.Content: hi sweetie. im sorry no for the delay in response but i dont normally frequent this forum. have u tried ur states attorneys generals office? they might possibly be able to help u. hugs hugs hugs.
Posts.Title: breast reconstruction complications

Posts.Content: hi tammy ....God love you. i know what its like to be on that good today bad tomorrow rollercoaster. just because u have microcalcifications in multiple areas it does not always mean breast ca. let me know what u found out and we can go from there since this post is so old. blessings sweetie.
